entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
